text: (tana kola) mitak atata gena emagin (obage birindata) gasanu. oba, (obage) daruvanva kada binda nodamanu” (yayi kivemu). niyata vasayenma api ohuva itamat ivasilivantayeku vasayenma dutuvemu. (ohu itamat) honda vahaleki. niyata vasayenma ohu (sæma karanavakadima apa desa) bala sitinneku vasayenma sitiyeya
